title: thillaana (nadhiru thanOm)
sahitya:
nAdir tanOm tanOm tanana dhIm tana dhirana 

(nAdhir)



anupallavi



nAdir tAni tomdir tAni tillilli tiilAna tAni

takiTa dhimita taka dhimita tadhingiNa tOm 

(nAdir)



caraNam



ninna nODi dhanyanAde harihara putra ninage vandipe daya nIDai



solkaTTu



tAm jhaNuta taka dhimitaka jhaNutaka tOm tadiranata jham taritaka

jhaNutaka

taka takiTa takajhaNuta nAdrudrudina tadhingiNatOm tOm tadina

tadhim tAdhim tadhim tAdhim tadhingiNatOm tadhingiNatOm

tadhingiNatOm tadhingiNatOm tadhingiNatOm tadhingiNatOm 

(dhIm)
